import React from 'react' import { useCart } from '../../context/CartContext' import { formatCurrency } from '../../utilities/formatCurrency'; function ProductCartItem({ item }) { const { removeFromCart, decreaseCartQuantity, increaseCartQuantity } = useCart(); return (

{item.name}

Price
{item?.salePrice ?

{formatCurrency(item.salePrice)}

:

{formatCurrency(item.price)}

}
Qty

{item.quantity}

Size

{item.selectedSize} {item.type}

Color
) } export default ProductCartItem
